Translations.Text: An la chuangzao wanwu, ranhou hai jiang zai chuangzao [fuhuo], zuihou, nimen dou jiang gui dao ta nali qu.
Fuhuo de shijian lailin zhi ri, fanzui zhe jiang shi juewang de.
Zai tamen suo chongbai de ouxiang zhong, jiang meiyou qiuqing zhe [ti tamen qiuqing],[na shi] tamen jiang fouren tamen suo chongbaiguo de ouxiang.
Fuhuo de shijian lailin zhi ri, zai na ri, tamen [xinshi he bu xinyang zhe] jiang bei fenkai.
Zhiyu xinyang bing xingshan zhe, tamen jiang zai leyuan li xiangshou yongjiu de kuaile [zhu].
Zhiyu bu xinyang, fouren wo de jixiang he houshi [yu wo] xiang hui zhe, zhexie ren jiang bei dai qu shou [huo yu zhi] xing.
[Xinshimen a!] Nimen dang zai wanshang [hun li he xiao li] he zaochen [chen li] zansong an la.
Tiandi jian de zansong, yiji [nimen] bangwan [bu li] he wuhou [shang li] de zansong quan gui ta [zhu][mei ri wu ci libai ding wei zhuming].
Ta cong wu shengwu zhong chansheng you shengwu, cong you shengwu zhong chansheng wu shengwu. Ta shi kusi de dadi fusu, nimen ye jiang ruci bei fuhuo.
